title: Episode 338 Discussion - MyAnimeList
author: MAL Community
description: Community discussion thread for One Piece Episode 338 featuring fan reactions to Brook's introduction and the Yomi Yomi no Mi reveal. The episode received high ratings with an 8.73/10 score and generated 71 forum replies.

title: One Piece Episode 338 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki article covering Episode 338's plot summary, production details, character appearances, and trivia. Includes information about the episode's air dates, director (Hiroyuki Sat≈ç), and animation staff.

title: Yomi Yomi no Mi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed article about the Yomi Yomi no Mi Devil Fruit, its abilities, limitations, and history. Covers Brook's use of the fruit and its unique resurrection mechanics.

title: Thriller Bark - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive article about Thriller Bark island-ship, its history, geography, and significance in the story. Details its conversion from a West Blue island into the world's largest ship.

title: Jungle P - Opening 9 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Article about the ninth One Piece opening theme 'Jungle P' by 5050, which was used for episodes 326-372. Notes that this was the first opening to feature the Thousand Sunny and Franky as an official crew member, with Brook also appearing.
